subject: Sports Injuries
Football
lead_paragraph: Defensive tackle Ndamukong Suh, who has been suspended and fined in the past for rough play, is under league scrutiny for a hit in Detroit’s win over Minnesota on Sunday.
snippet: Defensive tackle Ndamukong Suh, who has been suspended and fined in the past for rough play, is under league scrutiny for a hit in Detroit’s win over Minnesota on Sunday.
